statements: SELECT player_id, injury_type, recovery_time FROM injury_reports;
SELECT recovery_time, player_id, injury_type FROM injury_reports;
SELECT * FROM injury_reports WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_id, recovery_time FROM injury_reports WHERE injury_type = 'Sprain';
SELECT player_id, injury_type FROM injury_reports WHERE recovery_time = '1 week';
SELECT * FROM injury_reports WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_id, recovery_time FROM injury_reports WHERE injury_type = 'Knee Injury';
SELECT player_id, injury_type, recovery_time FROM injury_reports WHERE player_id > 5 ORDER BY player_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM injury_reports WHERE injury_type LIKE '%Sprain%' OR recovery_time = '2 weeks';
SELECT player_id, injury_type FROM injury_reports WHERE recovery_time NOT LIKE '%months%' ORDER BY injury_type ASC, player_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM InjuryReports ORDER BY player_id DESC;
SELECT player_name, player_position FROM Players WHERE player_position = 'Forward';
SELECT player_name, player_team, injury_type FROM Players JOIN InjuryReports ON Players.player_id = InjuryReports.player_id;
SELECT player_name, player_position, player_team FROM Players WHERE player_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM InjuryReports WHERE estimated_recovery_time > 30 ORDER BY player_id ASC;
SELECT player_name, player_position FROM Players WHERE player_team = 'Lakers';
SELECT player_name, player_position, player_team FROM Players ORDER BY player_position DESC;
SELECT player_name, player_position, player_team FROM Players WHERE player_position = 'Forward' ORDER BY player_name ASC;

SELECT player_name, player_position, injury_type FROM Players INNER JOIN InjuryReports ON Players.player_id = InjuryReports.player_id WHERE estimated_recovery_time > 30 ORDER BY estimated_recovery_time DESC;

SELECT player_name, player_position, injury_type, estimated_recovery_time FROM Players INNER JOIN InjuryReports ON Players.player_id = InjuryReports.player_id WHERE injury_type LIKE '%Hamstring%' ORDER BY estimated_recovery_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM players WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_name, team_name FROM players WHERE team_name = 'Team A';
SELECT player_name, date_of_birth FROM players ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT player_name, injury_type, recovery_time FROM players JOIN injuries ON players.player_id = injuries.player_id;
SELECT * FROM injury_logs WHERE log_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-04-30';
SELECT player_name, date_of_birth, team_name FROM players WHERE team_name = 'Arsenal';
SELECT player_name, date_of_birth, team_name FROM players ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT player_name, team_name, COUNT(*) AS total_injuries FROM players LEFT JOIN injuries ON players.player_id = injuries.player_id GROUP BY player_name, team_name;
SELECT player_name, COUNT(*) AS total_logs FROM players JOIN injuries ON players.player_id = injuries.player_id JOIN injury_logs ON injuries.injury_id = injury_logs.injury_id GROUP BY player_name;

SELECT player_name, team_name, injury_type, recovery_time FROM players JOIN injuries ON players.player_id = injuries.player_id WHERE team_name = 'Chelsea' AND recovery_time > 14 ORDER BY recovery_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT first_name, last_name, team FROM players WHERE team='Lakers';
SELECT id, team_name, city, state FROM teams WHERE state='California';
SELECT id, injury_type, recovery_time FROM injury_reports WHERE player_id='123';
SELECT * FROM injuries WHERE severity > 3;
SELECT * FROM players ORDER BY last_name DESC, first_name ASC
SELECT players.first_name, players.last_name, teams.team_name FROM players JOIN teams ON players.team = teams.team_name WHERE teams.city = 'New York'

SELECT injuries.injury_name, injuries.severity, players.first_name, players.last_name FROM injuries JOIN players ON injuries.id = players.id WHERE injuries.severity >= 3 ORDER BY injuries.severity DESC
SELECT players.first_name, players.last_name, injuries.injury_name, injuries.description FROM players LEFT JOIN injuries ON players.id = injuries.id WHERE injuries.injury_name IS NOT NULL

SELECT players.first_name, players.last_name, COUNT(injuries.id) AS total_injuries FROM players LEFT JOIN injuries ON players.id = injuries.id GROUP BY players.id HAVING total_injuries > 0 ORDER BY total_injuries DESC
SELECT * FROM player
SELECT name, team_id FROM player ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT id, type_of_injury FROM injury_report WHERE recovery_time > '1 week'
SELECT id, player_id, type_of_injury FROM injury_report WHERE type_of_injury = 'Sprained Ankle'
SELECT * FROM game WHERE date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM injury_report ORDER BY recovery_time DESC;
SELECT player.name, injury_report.type_of_injury, game.date FROM player JOIN injury_report ON player.id = injury_report.player_id JOIN game ON game.team_id = player.team_id;
SELECT player.name, team.name FROM player JOIN team ON player.team_id = team.id WHERE team.name = 'Team A';
SELECT player.name, injury_report.type_of_injury, injury_log.report_date FROM player JOIN injury_report ON player.id = injury_report.player_id JOIN injury_log ON injury_log.player_id = player.id;

SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_injuries, team.name FROM player JOIN team ON player.team_id = team.id JOIN injury_report ON player.id = injury_report.player_id GROUP BY team.name ORDER BY total_injuries DESC;
